review: I've tried several media sticks / boxes and this is my favorite.The app for your phone makes searching, searching by voice, navigating, and typing very easyAny content I use is on the Fire Stick - Netflix, Spotify, Primce, etcI like that the stick is a stand alone device.  I love the ChromeCast, but for the same price, the Fire Stick is independentAs far as imperfections, it seems to need a very strong wireless signal.  I can't use it in the upstairs bedroom farthest from the router but I can use my Roku.  Easy fix, move the router.The searching isn't as good as the Roku.  I wasn't paying attention a few times and selected content I thought would come up in Netflix (free) but I accidentally bought a show.  My own fault for going too fast, but I'm used to the Roku that tells you what channels the content is available on and what the price is so you can choose the free or cheapest one.Anyone that watches Netflix or has Prime should have one of these.
